name: Real-Time Parcel Tracking
description: Instantly track parcels in real-time for enhanced transparency.

name: Secure Parcel Handling
description: Ensure parcel safety with tamper-evident packaging and security notifications.

name: Express Delivery Options
description: Offer super-fast delivery choices, including express and same-day services.

name: User-Friendly Mobile App
description: Provide a seamless mobile app for easy parcel management and tracking.

name: Customized Delivery Preferences
description: Allow users to customize delivery times, instructions, and address preferences.

name: Customer Reviews and Ratings
description: Enable customers to leave feedback, building credibility and addressing concerns.
